Function Documentation

std::string cleanSlashes ( const std::string &  filename  )  [inline]

This returns a string with all slashes normalised to single forward slashes.

template<class T>
std::map< std::string, T >::iterator fileMapLookup ( std::map< std::string, T > &  fileMap,
const std::string &  filename 
) [inline]

This template function performs a slash-safe lookup of a filename in the provided map.

It assumes the slashes loaded into the map are correct!

In a non-consumer build, it will check for case mismatch and log it as a warning. This will slow down missed lookups considerably.

template<class T>
std::map< std::string, T >::const_iterator fileMapLookupConst ( const std::map< std::string, T > &  fileMap,
const std::string &  filename 
) [inline]

This template function performs a slash-safe lookup of a filename in the provided map.

It assumes the slashes loaded into the map are correct!

In a non-consumer build, it will check for case mismatch and log it as a warning. This will slow down missed lookups considerably.
